SlotCount_Tooltip: Restart the game if you reduce this below 5.
DisableBindToEmpty: Do Not Add New Items to Empty Slots
DisableBindToEmpty_Tooltip: You can override this for individual slots in BepInEx/plugins/QuickSlotsPlus/allowItems.json
MixedInputMode_Tooltip: Prevent items from unequiping, and labels from switching, when using keyboard and controller at the same time.
